thread.title: BRIEF-Mondelēz International Says Nelson Peltz To Step Down From Board

title: BRIEF-Mondelēz International Says Nelson Peltz To Step Down From Board
text: February 13, 2018 / 2:23 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Mondelēz International Says Nelson Peltz To Step Down From Board Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 13 (Reuters) - Mondelez International Inc: * MONDELĒZ INTERNATIONAL APPOINTS DEBRA CREW AND PETER MAY TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS; NELSON PELTZ TO STEP DOWN * MONDELEZ - ‍APPOINTED DEBRA CREW, PETER MAY, PRESIDENT AND A FOUNDING PARTNER OF TRIAN FUND MANAGEMENT L.P. TO COMPANY‘S BOARD​ * MONDELEZ - NELSON PELTZ, CEO AND A FOUNDING PARTNER OF TRIAN, INFORMED CO THAT HE WILL BE STEPPING DOWN FROM BOARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
